name: Solar Pearl
effect: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by {0}% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by {1}% for 6s.
description: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light of the sun and the moon, and pulses with a warm strength.
